message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. I think this is a great price considering its value to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $9,500 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11,000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my budget, I would like to counter with an offer of $10,500 for the product.
I understand your persistence, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $11,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11,250. I think this is a fair compromise.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to find a compromise. Based on my budget and the value of the product, I would like to counter with an offer of $11,000 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $11,200. This is my final offer.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. Considering my budget and the value of the product, I would like to counter with an offer of $11,100 for the product.
I'm not willing to go below my minimum price, Bob. I'm going to make a final counteroffer. I'll sell the product to you for $11,150. This is my absolute last offer.
Considering your last offer, Alice, I would like to counter with an offer of $11,100 for the product.
